mapper.select: select * from member_ex_set where day_Ex_Set like #{dayExSet}
select * from (select * from member_ex_set where day_Ex_Set like #{dayExSet} ) join exercise using (ecode) where part LIKE #{part}
SELECT MEMBERID, ECODE, EXNAME, EXERCISESET, EXERCISENUMBER FROM MEMBER_EX_SET WHERE MEMBERID=#{memberId}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER_EX_SET SET MEMBERID=#{memberId}, ECODE=#{ecode} EXNAME=#{exName}, EXERCISESET=#{exerciseSet}, EXERCISENUMBER=#{exerciseNumber}
